message.body: Who am I with for thanksgiving and Christmas this year?
I think it's my turn for thanksgiving and dads for Christmas. Well have to figure out the logistics given your new schedule and dad living on LI. Probabl
Aunt Ellie just invited us to farm for tgiving if we want
Ok i will talk to dad about it when he's here
Got ur message. If u r out I'll call u later when I am driving back to the city.
You can call now if you have time. Havent left yet
Blessing of the animals in church today. Joyous chaos! Cats dogs birds snakes and stuffed animals!
